p.k: When Gumball and Darwin decide it's time they join a crew, they agree that the coolest posse in Elmore is the Senior Citizens. / Gumball and Darwin discover that Rob, who once swore to wreak vengeance on them, has been trying to destroy them for some time... but his traps never work. / Dad is in charge of getting the kids to their first day back at school on time, but he's overslept and now he can't find Gumball, Darwin, or Anais anywhere. / Richard has lost all of the family’s money. Nicole is happy for the Wattersons to appear in a Joyful Burger commercial for some much needed cash. / Darwin joins the school marching band, and his tin-whistle talent lands him the solo. / Nicole arranges a playdate for Anais with the son of a classy lady she met at the supermarket. / Gumball refuses to get out of bed because he is in a lousy mood. / Things keep going missing in the house, so it’s up to Gumball and Darwin to find the culprit. / Gumball and Darwin hit snooze too many times on their alarm clock and miss the school-bus.
